title: Crypto Library
author: Crypto Library
content: Is there any running signature campaign which have weekly payment ? This disaster has blinded me.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I expected that the number of signature campaigns would decrease with the falling of bitcoin price (Bear market,) as spending on advertising would decrease because many companies are struggling to survive, but I was surprised by the number of companies doing advertising.The number of new people who join decreases as the price of Bitcoin goes down, so if you have more time try to develop yourself and you will find yourself in a suitable position to join one of the long-term signature campaigns.Try to prove yourself and campaign managers will be the ones to call you.
